Articles.Content:
If this is the wrong area to post please let me know.

Just a little video series I thought that I should do, I hope you like it.

Constructive criticism is certainly welcome!

Episode 1: A new day

It may not quite be as good because I was rather tired at the time when I was recording.

Crafts in this episode:

ESC- Jammer(All Stock)

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/91614167/KSP/ECS-Jammer.craft

Fire Corp Mk5 VTOL(SM-Ducted-Fan-VTOL-Engine, optional mechjeb for (m) version and Fustek station parts(big solar panels only))

Normal:

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/91614167/KSP/Fire%20Corp%20VTOL%20mk%205.craft

Mechjeb Version

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/91614167/KSP/Fire%20Corp%20VTOL%20mk%205%28m%29.craft

Satelite Launcher, Kerbi 1(Mechjeb)

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/91614167/KSP/Kerbi%201.craft

To install, go to your ksp install

folder, ships.

To SPH:

FireCorpVTOL.craft

FireCorpVTOL(m).craft

To VAB:

ESC-Jammer.craft

Kerbi1.craft

Episode 2: Kethane Rig

Crafts:

None this episode.

Episode 3: Immediate Action

Crafts:

Fire Corp mk5 VTOL with missiles(lazor base mod and lazor weapons)

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/91614167/KSP/Fire%20Corp%20VTOL%20mk%205%28mm%29.craft

add this to the SPH

Episode 4:

Ill get around to it in a few days. Or less.

Edited July 1, 2013 by FireTube
adding content

What mods did you use for those planes?

Well done!
I put the mods in the download secton(in the brakets) but there is one more mod I forgot... Adding it now.

NOOOO, nearly finished the second episode and 2 of the most important files just disappear! Now I have to re-record the entire episode!

Edited July 1, 2013 by FireTube
For some reason KSP is taking a ridiculous time to load, and it seems to crash quicker. So yeah... probably no more episodes for a week or so.

With 0.21 on its way, I assume that with these features it will break ALL the save files, I have decided to release the FK save file for anyone who wants to have fun with it.

Note: a few of the crafts use extra mods, so yeah.. Dont use those.

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/91614167/KSP/Fire%20Corporation.rar

Mods required:

Mechjeb, Kethane mod, SM-Ducted-Fan-VTOL-Engine,b9 aerospace, mechjeb for and Fustek station parts(big solar panels only)

I think thats it, if there are more I will put them in here.

And Munbase 1 part 1 will be out soon.

Edited July 13, 2013 by FireTube
